SELECT T1.CNTR_NO /* 계약번호 */ , T1.CNTR_SN /* 계약일련번호 */ , T1.CNTR_NO || T1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR /* 계약번호 */ , LTRIM(SUBSTR(T1.RVE_NO,-8),0) AS DP_NO/*입금번호 -수납번호*/ , T6.CST_NO /*고객번호*/ , T6.CST_KNM /*고객명*/ , T4.OG_CD /*지점-조직코드*/ , T4.PRTNR_KNM /* 판매자 */ , T3.SELL_PRTNR_NO /* 판매파트너번호 */ , T1.RVE_CD /*수납코드*/ , T2.SELL_TP_CD /*판매유형*/ , T1.OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ , T1.DP_DV_CD /*입금구분*/ , T1.DP_MES_CD /* 입금수단코드 */ , T1.DP_TP_CD /* 입금유형코드 */ , T9.VNCO_DV_CD /* VAN사구분코드 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.DP_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DP_DT /*입금일자*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.PERF_DT,'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PERF_DT /*실적일자*/ , T1.DP_AMT /*입금액*/ , (SELECT FNIT_NM FROM TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND FNIT_CD = T8.CRDCD_FNIT_CD ) AS FNIT_NM /*카드구분*/ , T8.CRCDNO_ENCR/*카드번호 */ , T8.CRDCD_ISTM_MCN /*신용카드할부개월수*/ , T8.CRDCD_APRNO /*신용카드승인번호*/ , T8.CRCDONR_NM /*신용카드주명*/ , T1.DP_CPRCNF_NO /*대사번호*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T3.CNTR_CAN_DTM, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNTR_CAN_DTM /*취소일자*/ , (SELECT X.USR_NM FROM T_CMP_USR_ACO_M X /* 사용자계정기본 */ WHERE X.EPNO = T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID AND X.DEL_YN = 'N' ) AS RGST_KNM /*입력담당자*/ , T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID /*번호-최초등록사용자ID*/ , (SELECT X.USR_NM FROM T_CMP_USR_ACO_M X WHERE X.EPNO = T7.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO AND X.DEL_YN = 'N') AS CLCTAM_PRTNR_NM/*집금담당자*/ , T7.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO /*번호*/ FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL T1 /* 수납상세 */ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 /* 계약상세 */ ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T3 /* 계약기본 */ ON T3.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T4 /* 월파트너내역 */ ON T3.SELL_PRTNR_NO = T4.PRTNR_NO AND T3.SELL_OG_TP_CD = T4.OG_TP_CD AND SUBSTR(T1.PERF_DT, 1, 6) = T4.BASE_YM AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_RVDW_RVE_BAS T5 /* 수납기본 */ ON T5.KW_GRP_CO_CD = T1.KW_GRP_CO_CD AND T5.RVE_NO = T1.RVE_NO AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T6 /* 고객기본 */ ON T6.CST_NO = T5.CST_NO AND T6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS T7 /* 채권계약기본 */ ON T7.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T7.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN AND T7.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_RVDW_CARD_STLM_DP_IZ T8 /* 카드결제입금내역 */ ON T8.KW_GRP_CO_CD = T1.KW_GRP_CO_CD AND T8.ITG_DP_NO = T1.ITG_DP_NO AND T8.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_RVDW_ITG_DP_BAS T9 /* 통합입금기본 */ ON T9.ITG_DP_NO = T1.ITG_DP_NO AND T9.KW_GRP_CO_CD = T1.KW_GRP_CO_CD AND T9.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1
AND T2.SELL_TP_CD = #{sellTpCd} /* 판매유형 */
AND T2.SELL_TP_CD IN ('1','2','3','6') /* 판매유형 */
AND T1.DP_DV_CD = #{dpDvCd} /* 입금구분 */
AND T1.DP_DV_CD IN ('1','2') /* 입금구분 */
AND T1.DP_MES_CD = #{dpMesCd} /* 입금수단 */
AND T1.DP_MES_CD IN ('01','02','03') /* 입금수단 */
AND T1.DP_TP_CD = #{dpTpCd} /*입금유형*/
AND T1.DP_TP_CD IN ('0101','0103','0104') /*입금유형*/
AND T9.VNCO_DV_CD = #{vncoDvCd} /* VAN사구분코드 */
AND SUBSTR(T1.DP_DT,0,8) BETWEEN #{startDt} AND #{endDt} /*입금일자*/
AND
T1.OG_TP_CD LIKE '%'||#{code}||'%' /*조직유형*/
AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} /*계약번호*/
AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}/*계약일련번호*/
AND (T7.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO >= #{stClctamPrtnrNo} OR T7.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO <= #{enClctamPrtnrNo}) /* 집금담당자사번 */
AND (T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID >= #{stFstRgstUsrId} OR T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID <= #{enFstRgstUsrId}) /* 입력담당자사번 */
